Name: Night Darkness
About the game: You have to take control of one of the most famous mercenaries and complete a special mission to save humanity from certain death. Explore the island where you found yourself after a helicopter crash and reveal all the secrets that are stored here. But beware of the enemies that await you on your way, because this island is inhabited by a variety of drones that yearn for your death. Features: Eliminate the threat alone. Play a small campaign in single player mode. Explore a new hostile world. Embark on an exciting journey and save humanity.
Meta Title: Night Darkness: Sep 5, 2021, Axe Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Night Darkness? Check out the release date (Sep 5, 2021), developer insights from Axe Games, and a complete game summary.
